docs.snippet: European Union officials announced the retaliatory moves it would take if the U.S. imposed levies on imported steel and aluminum.

docs.snippet: A Labor Department proposal would have given employers control over redistribution of tips, but the congressional spending bill would establish strict limits.

docs.snippet: Leaked emails suggest that Elliott Broidy promised foreign leaders access to the Trump administration. His suit accuses Qatar of being behind the leak.

docs.snippet: The transnational gang is a bit player compared with drug cartels. But its violence has helped the Trump administration sell its campaign against immigration.

docs.snippet: Lt. Gen. McMaster is the latest in a series of high-profile exits from President Trump’s administration. He will be replaced as national security adviser by John R. Bolton, a former ambassador to the United Nations.

headline.main: Lt. Gen. H.R. McMaster to Leave the Trump White House
